description:
DearDream was successful in putting on a concert their own way. Shortly after that, Junya was offered an enormous opportunity to train in New York under a world-famous entertainer. But if he leaves the country, he won`t be able to participate in Dream Fes. The decison Junya makes leaves Kanade emotionally shaken...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Journey of Dreams: Junya`s Decision
Yumeno Tabi e: Jun`ya no Ketsui
夢の旅へ 純哉の決意
